product_name: Salomon Quest 4D GTX Hiking Boots - Women's
long_description: Trek in comfort with the Salomon Quest 4D GTX women's hiking boots. They are nimble, supportive and lightweight like trail-running shoes but sturdy enough for long hauls with heavy loads. Long-lasting split suede leather and nylon mesh uppers offer flexibility, breathability and lightweight comfort. Seam-sealed Gore-Tex(R) membranes offer excellent protection from water yet allow moisture vapor to escape, keeping feet from overheating. Rubber toe caps and heel slings protect toes and uppers from bumps and abrasion. Padded, gusseted tongues relieve lace pressure while keeping trail debris and moisture out. Wicking polyester linings absorb and disperse excess moisture for comfort. Removable Ortholite(R) footbeds add shock absorption while antimicrobial treatment deters odors. Dual-density EVA midsoles absorb shock to supply lasting comfort and support. 4D Advanced Chassis(TM) thermoplastic urethane midsole supports help control flex, reduce ankle strain, enhance stability and protect feet from rough terrain. Contagrip(R) rubber outsoles keep you moving across rough surfaces, both wet and dry. Fit tip: runs true to size.
short_description: Trek in comfort with the Salomon Quest 4D GTX women's hiking boots. They are nimble, supportive and lightweight like trail-running shoes but sturdy enough for long hauls with heavy loads.
